Title: The Journalist - Orchard Theme
Description: Journalist is a smart, minimal theme designed for professional journalists, adapted to Orchard CMS.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Journalist is a smart, minimal theme designed for professional journalists, adapted to Orchard CMS.

The original theme was created for WordPress by Lucian E. Marin. For more information on this theme please visit http://lucianmarin.com/page/themes.
